_comment: Synergize CS2 Community Platform - Pelican Panel Egg
name: Synergize Platform
author: synergize@example.com
description: A full-stack CS2 community platform with Next.js frontend and Laravel backend. Features server browser, leaderboards, ban management, shop, and admin panel with Steam authentication.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

#############################################
#  SYNERGIZE PLATFORM - INSTALLATION LOG   #
#############################################

set -e

# Colors for output
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Logging functions
log_info() {
    echo -e "${BLUE}[INFO]${NC} $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') - $1"
}

log_success() {
    echo -e "${GREEN}[SUCCESS]${NC} $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') - $1"
}

log_warn() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARNING]${NC} $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') - $1"
}

log_error() {
    echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') - $1"
}

log_step() {
    echo -e "\n${CYAN}========================================${NC}"
    echo -e "${CYAN}  STEP: $1${NC}"
    echo -e "${CYAN}========================================${NC}\n"
}

# Start installation
echo -e "\n${GREEN}"
echo "  ███████╗██╗   ██╗███╗   ██╗███████╗██████╗  ██████╗ ██╗███████╗███████╗"
echo "  ██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝██╔══██╗██╔════╝ ██║╚══███╔╝██╔════╝"
echo "  ███████╗ ╚████╔╝ ██╔██╗ ██║█████╗  ██████╔╝██║  ███╗██║  ███╔╝ █████╗  "
echo "  ╚════██║  ╚██╔╝  ██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗██║   ██║██║ ███╔╝  ██╔══╝  "
echo "  ███████║   ██║   ██║ ╚████║███████╗██║  ██║╚██████╔╝██║███████╗███████╗"
echo "  ╚══════╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝╚══════╝╚══════╝"
echo -e "${NC}"
echo -e "${CYAN}  CS2 Community Platform - Installation Script${NC}"
echo -e "${CYAN}  =============================================${NC}\n"

log_info "Installation started at $(date)"
log_info "Working directory: /home/container"

#############################################
# STEP 1: System Dependencies
#############################################
log_step "Installing System Dependencies"

log_info "Updating package lists..."
apt update 2>&1 | while read line; do echo "  $line"; done
log_success "Package lists updated"

log_info "Installing required packages (curl, wget, unzip, git, jq)..."
apt install -y curl wget unzip git jq 2>&1 | while read line; do echo "  $line"; done
log_success "System dependencies installed"

# Check versions
log_info "Checking installed versions:"
echo "  - PHP: $(php -v | head -n 1)"
echo "  - Node: $(node -v)"
echo "  - NPM: $(npm -v)"
echo "  - Composer: $(composer -V | head -n 1)"
echo "  - Git: $(git --version)"

#############################################
# STEP 2: Create Directory Structure
#############################################
log_step "Creating Directory Structure"

cd /home/container
log_info "Current directory: $(pwd)"

log_info "Creating directories..."
mkdir -p frontend backend scripts logs storage
log_success "Created: frontend/"
log_success "Created: backend/"
log_success "Created: scripts/"
log_success "Created: logs/"
log_success "Created: storage/"

ls -la

#############################################
# STEP 3: Download Source Code
#############################################
log_step "Downloading Source Code"

log_info "Checking source configuration..."
log_info "  GITHUB_RELEASE_URL: ${GITHUB_RELEASE_URL:-'(not set)'}"
log_info "  GIT_REPO: ${GIT_REPO:-'(not set)'}"
log_info "  GIT_BRANCH: ${GIT_BRANCH:-main}"
log_info "  GIT_TOKEN: ${GIT_TOKEN:+'(set)'}${GIT_TOKEN:-'(not set)'}"

if [ ! -z "${GITHUB_RELEASE_URL}" ] && [ "${GITHUB_RELEASE_URL}" != "null" ]; then
    log_info "Using GitHub Release URL method"
    log_info "Downloading from: ${GITHUB_RELEASE_URL}"
    
    wget --progress=bar:force -O release.zip "${GITHUB_RELEASE_URL}" 2>&1
    
    if [ -f "release.zip" ]; then
        log_success "Download complete. File size: $(du -h release.zip | cut -f1)"
        
        log_info "Extracting release.zip..."
        unzip -o release.zip 2>&1 | tail -20
        
        log_info "Cleaning up zip file..."
        rm release.zip
        log_success "Source code extracted"
        
        log_info "Contents after extraction:"
        ls -la
    else
        log_error "Download failed - release.zip not found"
        exit 1
    fi
    
elif [ ! -z "${GIT_REPO}" ] && [ "${GIT_REPO}" != "null" ]; then
    log_info "Using Git Clone method"
    log_info "Repository: ${GIT_REPO}"
    log_info "Branch: ${GIT_BRANCH:-main}"
    
    if [ ! -z "${GIT_TOKEN}" ] && [ "${GIT_TOKEN}" != "null" ]; then
        log_info "Using authentication token"
        REPO_URL="https://${GIT_TOKEN}@${GIT_REPO#https://}"
    else
        log_info "No authentication token (public repo)"
        REPO_URL="${GIT_REPO}"
    fi
    
    log_info "Cloning repository..."
    git clone --depth 1 --branch ${GIT_BRANCH:-main} "${REPO_URL}" . 2>&1 | while read line; do echo "  $line"; done
    
    if [ -d ".git" ]; then
        log_success "Repository cloned successfully"
        log_info "Latest commit: $(git log -1 --oneline)"
    else
        log_error "Git clone failed"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    log_info "Contents after clone:"
    ls -la
    
else
    log_warn "No source URL specified!"
    log_warn "Creating placeholder structure for manual upload..."
    
    mkdir -p frontend/app frontend/components frontend/lib frontend/public
    mkdir -p backend/app backend/database backend/routes backend/config
    
    log_info "Placeholder directories created. You'll need to upload files manually."
fi

#############################################
# STEP 4: Install Backend Dependencies
#############################################
log_step "Installing Backend (Laravel) Dependencies"

if [ -f "backend/composer.json" ]; then
    log_info "Found backend/composer.json"
    cd /home/container/backend
    
    log_info "Running composer install..."
    composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader --no-interaction 2>&1 | while read line; do echo "  $line"; done
    
    if [ -d "vendor" ]; then
        log_success "Composer dependencies installed"
        log_info "Vendor directory size: $(du -sh vendor | cut -f1)"
    else
        log_error "Composer install may have failed - vendor directory not found"
    fi
    
    # Setup .env file
    log_info "Setting up environment file..."
    if [ -f ".env.example" ]; then
        if [ ! -f ".env" ]; then
            cp .env.example .env
            log_success "Created .env from .env.example"
        else
            log_info ".env already exists, keeping existing"
        fi
    else
        log_warn ".env.example not found"
    fi
    
    # Generate app key
    log_info "Generating application key..."
    php artisan key:generate --force 2>&1 || log_warn "Key generation skipped"
    
    cd /home/container
else
    log_warn "backend/composer.json not found - skipping backend setup"
    log_info "Directory contents:"
    ls -la backend/ 2>/dev/null || echo "  (backend directory is empty)"
fi

#############################################
# STEP 5: Install Frontend Dependencies
#############################################
log_step "Installing Frontend (Next.js) Dependencies"

if [ -f "frontend/package.json" ]; then
    log_info "Found frontend/package.json"
    cd /home/container/frontend
    
    log_info "Contents of package.json:"
    cat package.json | head -20
    echo "  ..."
    
    log_info "Running npm install..."
    npm install 2>&1 | while read line; do echo "  $line"; done
    
    if [ -d "node_modules" ]; then
        log_success "NPM dependencies installed"
        log_info "node_modules size: $(du -sh node_modules | cut -f1)"
    else
        log_error "npm install may have failed - node_modules not found"
    fi
    
    # Build if not pre-built
    if [ ! -d ".next" ]; then
        log_info "Building Next.js application..."
        log_info "This may take a few minutes..."
        
        npm run build 2>&1 | while read line; do echo "  $line"; done
        
        if [ -d ".next" ]; then
            log_success "Next.js build complete"
            log_info ".next directory size: $(du -sh .next | cut -f1)"
        else
            log_error "Build may have failed - .next directory not found"
        fi
    else
        log_info "Pre-built .next directory found, skipping build"
        log_info ".next directory size: $(du -sh .next | cut -f1)"
    fi
    
    cd /home/container
else
    log_warn "frontend/package.json not found - skipping frontend setup"
    log_info "Directory contents:"
    ls -la frontend/ 2>/dev/null || echo "  (frontend directory is empty)"
fi

#############################################
# STEP 6: Create Start Script
#############################################
log_step "Creating Startup Script"

log_info "Writing scripts/start.sh..."

cat > /home/container/scripts/start.sh << 'STARTSCRIPT'
#!/bin/bash

# Colors
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
NC='\033[0m'

log_info() { echo -e "${BLUE}[INFO]${NC} $(date '+%H:%M:%S') - $1"; }
log_success() { echo -e "${GREEN}[OK]${NC} $(date '+%H:%M:%S') - $1"; }
log_warn() { echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARN]${NC} $(date '+%H:%M:%S') - $1"; }
log_error() { echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $(date '+%H:%M:%S') - $1"; }

cd /home/container

echo -e "\n${CYAN}"
echo "  ███████╗██╗   ██╗███╗   ██╗███████╗██████╗  ██████╗ ██╗███████╗███████╗"
echo "  ██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝██╔══██╗██╔════╝ ██║╚══███╔╝██╔════╝"
echo "  ███████╗ ╚████╔╝ ██╔██╗ ██║█████╗  ██████╔╝██║  ███╗██║  ███╔╝ █████╗  "
echo "  ╚════██║  ╚██╔╝  ██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗██║   ██║██║ ███╔╝  ██╔══╝  "
echo "  ███████║   ██║   ██║ ╚████║███████╗██║  ██║╚██████╔╝██║███████╗███████╗"
echo "  ╚══════╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝╚══════╝╚══════╝"
echo -e "${NC}"
echo -e "${CYAN}  CS2 Community Platform - Starting...${NC}\n"

log_info "=== CONFIGURATION ==="
log_info "APP_URL: ${APP_URL:-'(not set)'}"
log_info "DB_HOST: ${DB_HOST:-'(not set)'}"
log_info "DB_PORT: ${DB_PORT:-5432}"
log_info "DB_DATABASE: ${DB_DATABASE:-'(not set)'}"
log_info "DB_USERNAME: ${DB_USERNAME:-'(not set)'}"
log_info "DB_PASSWORD: ${DB_PASSWORD:+'(set)'}${DB_PASSWORD:-'(not set)'}"
log_info "STEAM_API_KEY: ${STEAM_API_KEY:+'(set)'}${STEAM_API_KEY:-'(not set)'}"
log_info "BACKEND_PORT: ${BACKEND_PORT:-8000}"
log_info "SERVER_PORT (frontend): ${SERVER_PORT:-3000}"
echo ""

# Set environment
export APP_URL="${APP_URL:-http://localhost}"
export DB_CONNECTION="pgsql"
export DB_HOST="${DB_HOST}"
export DB_PORT="${DB_PORT:-5432}"
export DB_DATABASE="${DB_DATABASE}"
export DB_USERNAME="${DB_USERNAME}"
export DB_PASSWORD="${DB_PASSWORD}"
export STEAM_API_KEY="${STEAM_API_KEY}"
export FRONTEND_URL="${APP_URL}"

# Create logs directory
mkdir -p logs

# Update backend .env
log_info "=== CONFIGURING BACKEND ==="
if [ -f "backend/.env.example" ] && [ ! -f "backend/.env" ]; then
    cp backend/.env.example backend/.env
    log_success "Created backend/.env from example"
fi

if [ -f "backend/.env" ]; then
    log_info "Updating backend/.env with environment variables..."
    sed -i "s|APP_URL=.*|APP_URL=${APP_URL}|g" backend/.env
    sed -i "s|FRONTEND_URL=.*|FRONTEND_URL=${APP_URL}|g" backend/.env
    sed -i "s|DB_CONNECTION=.*|DB_CONNECTION=pgsql|g" backend/.env
    sed -i "s|DB_HOST=.*|DB_HOST=${DB_HOST}|g" backend/.env
    sed -i "s|DB_PORT=.*|DB_PORT=${DB_PORT}|g" backend/.env
    sed -i "s|DB_DATABASE=.*|DB_DATABASE=${DB_DATABASE}|g" backend/.env
    sed -i "s|DB_USERNAME=.*|DB_USERNAME=${DB_USERNAME}|g" backend/.env
    sed -i "s|DB_PASSWORD=.*|DB_PASSWORD=${DB_PASSWORD}|g" backend/.env
    sed -i "s|STEAM_API_KEY=.*|STEAM_API_KEY=${STEAM_API_KEY}|g" backend/.env
    log_success "Backend .env updated"
else
    log_warn "backend/.env not found!"
fi

# Run migrations
log_info "=== DATABASE MIGRATIONS ==="
if [ -f "backend/artisan" ]; then
    cd backend
    log_info "Running php artisan migrate --force..."
    php artisan migrate --force 2>&1
    MIGRATE_EXIT=$?
    if [ $MIGRATE_EXIT -eq 0 ]; then
        log_success "Migrations completed successfully"
    else
        log_warn "Migration returned exit code $MIGRATE_EXIT (may be OK if tables exist)"
    fi
    
    log_info "Caching configuration..."
    php artisan config:cache 2>/dev/null && log_success "Config cached" || log_warn "Config cache skipped"
    php artisan route:cache 2>/dev/null && log_success "Routes cached" || log_warn "Route cache skipped"
    cd ..
else
    log_warn "backend/artisan not found - skipping migrations"
fi

# Frontend .env
log_info "=== CONFIGURING FRONTEND ==="
if [ -d "frontend" ]; then
    echo "NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=${APP_URL}" > frontend/.env.local
    echo "NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME=Synergize" >> frontend/.env.local
    log_success "Created frontend/.env.local"
    log_info "Contents:"
    cat frontend/.env.local | sed 's/^/  /'
fi

# Set ports
BACKEND_PORT=${BACKEND_PORT:-8000}
FRONTEND_PORT=${SERVER_PORT:-3000}

log_info "=== STARTING SERVICES ==="
echo ""

# Start Laravel backend
if [ -f "backend/artisan" ]; then
    log_info "Starting Laravel backend on port ${BACKEND_PORT}..."
    cd /home/container/backend
    php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=${BACKEND_PORT} 2>&1 | sed 's/^/[BACKEND] /' &
    BACKEND_PID=$!
    log_success "Backend started (PID: ${BACKEND_PID})"
    cd /home/container
else
    log_error "Cannot start backend - artisan not found"
    BACKEND_PID=""
fi

# Wait for backend to initialize
sleep 2

# Start Next.js frontend
if [ -d "frontend/node_modules" ]; then
    cd /home/container/frontend
    if [ -d ".next" ]; then
        log_info "Starting Next.js (production) on port ${FRONTEND_PORT}..."
        npm run start -- -p ${FRONTEND_PORT} 2>&1 | sed 's/^/[FRONTEND] /' &
    else
        log_info "Starting Next.js (development) on port ${FRONTEND_PORT}..."
        npm run dev -- -p ${FRONTEND_PORT} 2>&1 | sed 's/^/[FRONTEND] /' &
    fi
    FRONTEND_PID=$!
    log_success "Frontend started (PID: ${FRONTEND_PID})"
    cd /home/container
else
    log_error "Cannot start frontend - node_modules not found"
    FRONTEND_PID=""
fi

echo ""
echo -e "${GREEN}========================================${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}  Synergize platform is running${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}========================================${NC}"
echo ""
echo -e "  Frontend:    ${CYAN}http://0.0.0.0:${FRONTEND_PORT}${NC}"
echo -e "  Backend API: ${CYAN}http://0.0.0.0:${BACKEND_PORT}${NC}"
echo ""
echo -e "  Log files:"
echo -e "    - Backend:  logs/backend.log"
echo -e "    - Frontend: logs/frontend.log"
echo ""
echo -e "${YELLOW}  Press Ctrl+C to stop${NC}"
echo ""

# Handle shutdown
cleanup() {
    echo ""
    log_info "Shutting down services..."
    [ ! -z "$BACKEND_PID" ] && kill $BACKEND_PID 2>/dev/null && log_info "Backend stopped"
    [ ! -z "$FRONTEND_PID" ] && kill $FRONTEND_PID 2>/dev/null && log_info "Frontend stopped"
    exit 0
}

trap cleanup SIGTERM SIGINT

# Wait for processes
if [ ! -z "$BACKEND_PID" ] && [ ! -z "$FRONTEND_PID" ]; then
    wait -n $BACKEND_PID $FRONTEND_PID
    log_error "A service has stopped unexpectedly!"
    cleanup
else
    log_error "One or more services failed to start"
    sleep 30
    exit 1
fi
STARTSCRIPT

chmod +x /home/container/scripts/start.sh
log_success "Start script created and made executable"

#############################################
# STEP 7: Final Summary
#############################################
log_step "Installation Complete!"

echo -e "\n${GREEN}=== INSTALLATION SUMMARY ===${NC}"
echo ""

# Check what was installed
echo "Directory structure:"
ls -la /home/container/ | sed 's/^/  /'
echo ""

if [ -d "backend/vendor" ]; then
    echo -e "${GREEN}✓${NC} Backend dependencies installed"
else
    echo -e "${RED}✗${NC} Backend dependencies NOT installed"
fi

if [ -d "frontend/node_modules" ]; then
    echo -e "${GREEN}✓${NC} Frontend dependencies installed"
else
    echo -e "${RED}✗${NC} Frontend dependencies NOT installed"
fi

if [ -d "frontend/.next" ]; then
    echo -e "${GREEN}✓${NC} Frontend built"
else
    echo -e "${YELLOW}!${NC} Frontend not pre-built (will build on first start)"
fi

if [ -f "scripts/start.sh" ]; then
    echo -e "${GREEN}✓${NC} Start script created"
else
    echo -e "${RED}✗${NC} Start script NOT created"
fi

echo ""
echo -e "${CYAN}Installation completed at $(date)${NC}"
echo -e "${CYAN}You can now start the server!${NC}"
echo ""

variables.name: Application URL
variables.description: The public URL where Synergize will be accessible (e.g., https://synergize.example.com)

variables.name: Steam API Key
variables.description: Steam Web API key for authentication. Get one at https://steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey

variables.name: GitHub Release URL
variables.description: Direct URL to the release zip file (leave empty to use Git repo instead)

variables.name: Git Access Token
variables.description: Personal access token for private repositories (leave empty for public repos)

variables.name: Backend Port
variables.description: Port for the Laravel API backend (internal)

variables.name: Auto Update
variables.description: Automatically pull latest code on startup (only works with Git repo)
